graph.name: MonetGraph
graph.description: Parses a grid graph given in the Monet-Graph-Format and calculates an heuristic for the Namoa-Algorithm

parameter.name: startNodeid
parameter.description: Source of the single source shortest path graph.

parameter.name: endNodeid
parameter.description: Destination of the single source shortest path graph.

parameter.name: directed
parameter.description: Boolean that indicates if the graph is directed.
